start.intro: Hello {username}! ğŸ‘‹ğŸ» Welcome to BW Monastery ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ Letâ€™s embark on an exciting journey with our puzzle hunt, "The Lost Mooncake Recipe." æ‚¨å¥½ {username}ï¼ ğŸ‘‹ğŸ» æ¬¢è¿æ‚¨åˆ°å‰ç¥¥å®èšå¯º ğŸ‰ğŸ‰ è®©æˆ‘ä»¬è¸ä¸Šä¸€æ®µæ¿€åŠ¨äººå¿ƒçš„æ—…ç¨‹ï¼Œå¼€å§‹æˆ‘ä»¬çš„å¯»å®æ¸¸æˆã€å¤±è½çš„æœˆé¥¼é£Ÿè°±ã€‘ Before we begin, please choose your preferred language: åœ¨å¼€å§‹ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œè¯·é€‰æ‹©æ‚¨çš„é¦–é€‰è¯­è¨€ï¼š

rules: Let's begin the puzzle hunt! Here are some rules

ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ« [Rules: 1/3]
Now let's go through some ground rules. Take your time to read them carefully, as your game timer has not started yet.

ğŸ¾ Your game is a trail of stages with scheduled break(s) in between. Please make sure you only send one message at any one time, or you will confuse the bot and may be penalised! Please be patient as the bot ponders your answers.

ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ« [Rules: 2/3]
Your game will be timed. Each incorrect answer adds a penalty of 5 minutes to your final timing, so answer carefully! Need help solving a Stage? A hint is available, but at a cost. Please refer to the image below for details.

The timer will be paused during breaks, so you can properly relax ğŸ˜‰

ğŸ§‘â€ğŸ« [Rules: 3/3] Finally, stay in public spaces, and be discreet in your discussions - you never know if other players are listening in! You do not need to enter any fenced premises or private property unless specifically asked to. Feel free to also send in your selfies and photos through the race. Ready for your first stage? Type 'UNDERSTOOD' and the first stage will be sent. Good luck.

text:
Stage 1:
Look at the image carefully, it will lead you to the location. When facing the shrine hall, which side can you find the ğŸ‘¶ğŸ»ğŸ¦?

info: Stone Lions are symbols of protection (yin metal).the male lion represents power (yang metal) over the world in imperial china, while the female lion represents care (yang metal) for the souls in the building.
hint:
Look carefully under the feet of the stone lions

text: Stage 2: You head towards LEFT side of the Monastery and find a Buddha Statue with a BELL ğŸ””. Look carefully, how many yellow chinese knots are there? [Spell out the number eg. 1 - one 2 - two]
info: Did you know Ksitigarhba made a vow to take the responsibility to guide all living beings in the six realms and only achieve Buddhahood and get out of the cycle of birth and rebirth until all hell beings are out of hell (yin earth)
hint: Circumambulate around Kshitigarbha and you will find your answer

text:
Stage 3:
Making your way towards the side gate, something sparkles at the corner of your eyesâœ¨, lots of GEMS ğŸ’ğŸ’ğŸ’ and GOLD ğŸ’°ğŸ’µ. There is a small hidden creature spewing GOLD ğŸ’°ğŸ’°ğŸ’°, what creature is that?
info: Did you know that the Yellow Dzambhala was assigned to help all beings overcome poverty and grant wealth to them.
hint: Look for the label inside of the Yellow Dzambhala Statue

text:
Stage 4:
Let's RAMP UP the difficulty, look for a TIME CAPSULE. Make your way through the maze below from start to end. In the maze, you can only go through things found in the time capsule. Tell me what word you will form on your way out?
Time for a break. Head up to Level 2's Kitchen and enjoy the snacks!

Stage 5:
You exit the kitchen and walk towards a Buddha Statue at the end of the corridor. It is Thousand-armed and Thousand-eyed Avalokiteshvara. The multitude of hands and eyes is mesmerizing. 
Eh, something is missing from my photo. Can you tell me what is it?
hint: Look closer it is something GREEN
